conclusion: Preliminary objection rejected (non-exhaustion);Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of Art. 6-3-a;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
